channel.title: [show-off] Donuts armor
channel.description:
well here it is my very own custom armor. ive made this from scratch after i asked senne teddy for the models and he told me no.... so i made my own put it on my server got all the bugs out of it.
[img]http://froob-games.webs.com/rex's%20armor.JPG[/img]
and yes i do make my models from scratch i dont like giving most credit to people that made the models.
Credits 80% me 15% senne teddy because he made this 1st 5% Jagex
how bad of a job did i do? and it has wings so what dont like it dont post, GTFO and let the thread die that simple.
my next creation will be a special plate. when you where the plate your hair catches on fire and the flames are high enough to work with any helmet you put on.
Siclent CJ i am sorry for useing your name i ment senne teddy

item.title: [show-off] Donuts armor
item.dc:creator: @ak226688 ak226688
item.description:
@ak226688 wrote:

[quote=“Doom32dd, post:21, topic:275832”]jagex has nothing to do with it though :[/quote]those realy dont look like bandos arms do they…

[quote=“sgtdonut, post:24, topic:275832”]if you look at something it is theres…its becomes yours when its done. once i made it from scratch over here at my desk it became 100% mine with inspiration from teddy & jagex[/quote]more like leeching from teddy n jagex

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:

You deserve 0% credit for this poor recolor! :mad:
[/quote]

ok i got the name wrong i just got done reading CJ’s how to model thread

i give up all of you think i re colored someone elses work…well continue saying that and belive what you want you are entitled to your own opinion and i know that i made it from scratch
[btw here is the thread that started it all][/quote]

You still do desereve 0 credit…All you did was copy what someone has already done.

item.title: [show-off] Donuts armor
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:10, topic:275832”][quote author=sgtdonut link=topic=364361.msg2765842#msg2765842 date=1240789106]
hey like i said i dont like recoloring because then its not yours its someone elses just with a different paint job. ive been game designing for 6 years so i can do exact copies no problem im just that good when im focused and have my mind set.

a 16 year old waiting to go to college so he can get hired by a real company…
[/quote]
this post really makes it hard for me not to be an asshole…[/quote]

I know…All he did (If even this…) was take someone elses model…Redo it…and then recolor it. IF he even re-did it…Which I doubt…

Oh, and add some primitives.

item.title: [show-off] Donuts armor
item.dc:creator: @sgtdonut sgtdonut
item.description:
@sgtdonut wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:4, topic:275832”]Wow i like that armour but ive seen Gamerstips have that sort of armour aswell.

Also wings are getting old. Try develope something either than Wings or Cape.[/quote]

ok thanks for the idea something other then a cape or wings…i think i have an ide after watching star wars the clone wars. and yeah after looking around the forums in the 4 months ive been gone i do see a lot of wings…

[quote=“Setsuna, post:5, topic:275832”][quote author=sgtdonut link=topic=364361.msg2765842#msg2765842 date=1240789106]
hey like i said i dont like recoloring because then its not yours its someone elses just with a different paint job. ive been game designing for 6 years so i can do exact copies no problem im just that good when im focused and have my mind set.

a 16 year old waiting to go to college so he can get hired by a real company…
[/quote]

So basically…You just took someones armour, copied it, and then recolored it.

Not much of a difference…Don’t get me wrong though, it does look awesome.[/quote]

i copied it without copying it thats why he got credit. i wanted to use the models but i was denied so i made this from memory because i lost the interwebs the next day

Read full topic
